article.headline: S. Utah 82, Centenary 79
article.story: CEDAR CITY, Utah (AP) -- Tate Sorensen scored 15 points, leading Southern Utah to an 82-79 win over Centenary on Thursday night. Geoff Payne scored 13 points and had 11 assists for the Thunderbirds (5-14, 3-5 Summit), while Rick Roberts and Davis Baker scored 12 points each and Orlando Griego added 10. Southern Utah shot 53 percent from the field and out-rebounded the Gentlemen 35-26. Tyrone Hamilton led Centenary (9-11, 3-5) with 29 points, including a 6-for-12 performance from 3-point range. Nick Stallings scored 21 points for the Gents, and Lance Hill had 14. After a three-point play midway through the second half, Hamilton hit four straight 3-pointers to bring Centenary back from a 67-57 deficit. The last one of those gave the Gents a 69-67 lead with 9:19 to play. Hamilton hit another 3-pointer with 4:05 to go, tying the game 75-75, but Roberts responded with a layup to give the Thunderbirds the lead with 2:18 left. Roberts? tight defense kept Hamilton from touching the ball in the final two minutes, and Dave Marek hit three crucial free throws to clinch it for Southern Utah.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
